articles.description: Columbus, Ohio, officials are decrying how officers handled rendering aid to Andre Hill after he was shot by a police officer earlier this month.

articles.title: Manchester United forward Edinson Cavani handed three-match ban by FA over social media post
articles.description: Manchester United forward Edinson Cavani has been handed a three-match ban and fined £100,000 ($136,594) by the English Football Association in relation to a social media post.

articles.author: Rob Picheta and Benjamin Berteau, CNN
articles.title: Boris Johnson's father says he'll seek French citizenship, hours before Brexit
articles.description: Stanley Johnson, the father of British Prime Minister Boris Johnson, has said that he intends to obtain French citizenship -- his comments coming just hours before the UK's final transition out of the European Union.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: A redesigned South Carolina flag was scrapped after residents made fun of its palmetto tree
articles.description: Lambasted by residents of the state, South Carolina's newly proposed state flag has been scrapped, the Post and Courier reported this week. The South Carolina State Flag Study Committee was created in 2018 to standardize the flag.
